DOC.brief_summary: It hypothesize whole body vibration exercise group significantly improvement physical functioning reduction fall incidence among institutionalized elderly , compare conventional exercise group control group .
DOC.brief_title: Whole Body Vibration Exercise Training Institutionalized Elderly
DOC.criteria: Functional Ambulation Category 1 4 able understand simple verbal command able tolerate intermittent physical activity least 45 minute able perform knee flexion > 45 degree able stand without support 1 minute peripheral vascular disease symptom associate vestibular disorder contraindication exercise ( e.g . unstable angina ) serious illness preclude participation ( e.g . cancer )
